Articles.Content: Hey, I had to reinstall all my mods for KSP and I seem to be missing a crucial part that used for most of my vtols. It was an incredibly overpowered reaction wheel, I think it was called a small stabilizer. It was red and grey and worked like a charm. After I reinstalled all my mods again I can't seem to find it or what mod it was on. Not sure if it was an update that lost it or what, but really miss my old planes and its usefulness. Does anyone know what I'm talking about. Let me know if you know what mod it came with. I don't think it was new reaction wheels, as that mod is the same version I uninstalled.

Welcome to the forum @jtwilson44.

I have moved your question to add-on discussions.
